documents.title: friends forever
text: the director of 1990s us sitcom friends says a fan 's proposed alternative ending that went viral is `` not funny '' .

in gareth stranks ' dark ending , the show is revealed to be a `` meth-addled fantasy of a homeless phoebe '' , who imagines the five friends she watches through the windows of central perk are her own .
speaking to bbc radio 5 live , friends director kevin bright said the ending was not right for the comedy , but he was not `` offended '' by the fan 's proposal .
`` you ca n't get annoyed because it really comes out of love it 's keeping the show alive , trying to take a bit of ownership in some odd way , '' he said .
asked whether a reunion could ever be a possibility , he said : `` going backwards is probably not what the cast wants right now '' .

documents.title: record-breaking game of thrones
text: the march of game of thrones continues as the popular series has now entered the guinness book of world records .
it has taken the record for largest tv drama simulcast after the second episode of season five of the fantasy epic was broadcast in 173 countries simultaneously earlier this year .
that was two countries more than csi , which took the record just five weeks earlier .
receiving an official certificate on behalf of the show was maisie williams , who plays arya stark .
she said : `` i 'm so pleased for game of thrones to be a part of guinness world records .
i 'm going to tell my step brother as he gets the book every year for christmas .
i ca n't wait to see the look on his face . ''

documents.title: van gogh revamp
text: the world-famous van gogh museum in amsterdam is celebrating the completion of its new entrance hall .
work began on the project in april 2014 and the museum will be officially opened on friday , when it will be closed to the public ahead of the opening weekend on 5 and 6 september .
and here 's how it all came together .

documents.title: libertines announce club tour
text: following their headline slots at the reading and leeds festivals , the libertines have announced they will play a series of intimate uk shows next week .
pete doherty and carl barat 's reformed group will play :
the final date coincides with the release of anthems for doomed youth , their first album since 2004 .
if you ca n't get enough of pete , carl and co , a libertines-themed `` art happening '' titled somewhere over the railings opened yesterday at the dublin castle in camden , london .
it includes a photo exhibition , a libertines pub quiz , a documentary by roger sargent and album playbacks .
and next door , the pop-up bucket shop - selling and displaying rare band memorabilia and art - is open until friday .

documents.title: the danish girl trailer
text: eddie redmayne is being tipped as an award contender again , a year after his oscar-winning performance as professor stephen hawking in the theory of everything .
he is now starring in another bio the danish girl , playing transgender woman lili elbe , one of the first people to have gender affirmation surgery .
the first trailer has just been released .
meanwhile , director tom hooper has told screen daily he cast redmayne because he sensed a `` certain gender fluidity '' in the actor .
eddie was really the person i wanted to make the film with , and i was very passionate about that .
i was a great believer in him as an actor .
i think also there 's a certain gender fluidity that i sensed in him , that i found intriguing and it led me to think he might be a really interesting person to cast in this role .

documents.title: glasgow school of art boost
text: the project to restore glasgow school of art 's ( gsa ) fire-damaged mackintosh building has been boosted by a donation of detailed architectural drawings .
the scale drawings of the mackintosh were made by queensland university of technology professor george cairns in the 1990s as part of a phd at gsa .
he has now donated them to the art school in the hope they can aid efforts to restore the iconic building , where fire broke out in may last year .
gsa is still engaged in a bid to raise £ 20m to restore the mackintosh .
the building was badly damaged , but most of its structure and contents were saved .

documents.title: what one direction fans really want
text: one direction clearly have loftier ambitions than breaking mere chart records .
the band have released a video featuring some of their fans telling world leaders how they want the world to change , which is all part of an initiative called action2015 .

documents.title: broadbent to play scrooge
text: jim broadbent is to star in a new west end production of a christmas carol .
the moulin rouge actor will play scrooge in a new version of the charles dickens favourite .
the production has been adapted by the 39 steps writer patrick barlow , who performed with broadbent for several years as part of comedy troupe the national theatre of brent .
a christmas carol will run at the noel coward theatre from 30 november to 30 january .
the paddington and harry potter star can next be seen on film in nicholas hytner 's the lady in the van , based on alan bennett 's play of the same name .

documents.title: harper lee manuscript
text: sorry to disappoint you literary lovers out there but it seems that some pages of text discovered in a safe deposit box in alabama , which harper lee 's lawyer suggested could be a further novel by the author , are actually just early drafts of her two published works .

rare books expert james s. jaffe told the wall street journal that the script that had caused the most speculation turned out to be 145 typed pages representing an early version of part one of to kill a mockingbird .
those pages are clearly compiled from several different early drafts , he added .
the box also contained a later copy-edited typescript of mockingbird and an original copy of go set a watchman , which was published earlier this year .
the book was set 20 years after mockingbird and controversially turned much-loved character atticus finch into a racist `` bigot '' .
author: Wall Street Journal

documents.title: cattrall takes over woman 's hour
text: woman 's hour takeover week returns on bbc radio 4 from monday 14 to friday 18 september .
the week involves five different well-known women who take over the programme for a day each across the week .
this year 's hosts are sex and the city star kim cattrall , fgm campaigner nimco ali , bishop of gloucester rachel trewee , entrepreneur michelle mone and author dame jacqueline wilson .
actress cattrall 's edition of the programme on monday will focus on choosing a life without children , as well as explore the themes of ageing , being single later in life and loss .

documents.title: hoult to play jd salinger
text: x men star nicholas hoult has landed the lead role in jd salinger biopic rebel in the rye .

the actor , who will also star in the upcoming kill your friends , will explore the catcher in the rye author 's rebellious youth and life on the front line during world war two , as well as his love life and writing career .
danny strong is directing the film from his own screenplay , which has been adapted from kenneth slawenski biography 's jd salinger : a life .
the catcher in the rye , first published in 1951 , is a tale of teenage angst and has become one of the most influential american novels of the modern era .
but salinger shunned the fame it brought and became a recluse .
he died in 2010 .

documents.title: breakingbeverley sisters singer dies
text: joy beverley ( centre ) , one third of the vocal harmony group the beverley sisters , has died at the age of 91 .
the singer , from bethnal green in london , was the eldest sister in the trio , who were known for songs including little drummer boy and the irving berlin standard sisters .
they had their own bbc tv show in the 1950s and were made mbes in 2006 .

documents.title: london film festival line-up
text: we already knew suffragette ( starring meryl streep ) , carol ( cate blanchett ) and steve jobs ( michael fassbender ) would lead the field at next month 's london film festival .
now , the full programme has announced some other gems .

they include trumbo , starring bryan cranston as dalton trumbo , the hollywood screenwriter who was blacklisted after refusing to testify before the house committee on un-american activities in 1947 .
the film also stars diane lane , helen mirren , elle fanning , louis ck and john goodman .
scott cooper will be bringing his chilling crime drama black mass to the festival , starring johnny depp , benedict cumberbatch and joel edgerton .

and nicholas hytner 's the lady in the van , adapted from writer alan bennett 's play , will also feature , starring maggie smith , alex jennings , jim broadbent , frances de la tour and roger allam .

a david bowie documentary will also premiere - let 's dance : bowie down under explores for the first time the story behind let 's dance , and how the birth of mtv , and an unlikely journey deep into the australian outback , led to its success .

documents.title: community service for django actress
text: django unchained actress daniele watts has been ordered to perform community service after pleading no contest to disturbing the peace .
last september , police questioned watts and her boyfriend brian lucas while investigating reports of people having sex in a car .
watts , who 's black , and lucas , who 's white , claimed they were targeted due to race .
the couple apologised to the police , but the judge said the apologies were insincere and the pair were sentenced to 15 hours of community service .

documents.title: 'toxic ' vmas criticised
text: it 's hardly news really , given that they attack the awards pretty much every year - but once again , the parents television council has taken the mtv music video awards ( vmas ) to task .

`` mtv rated the content of the programme as appropriate for a child as young as 14 , though most parents of teens that age would find such a content rating preposterous , '' said ptc president tim winter .
`` in the end , the network succeeded in what it wanted to do - stir up controversy without regard to its impact on an entertainment environment that is increasingly toxic for children . ''
the council took particular issue with host miley cyrus , who briefly exposed one of her breasts from behind a curtain towards the end of the show .
`` are we surprised that miley cyrus exposed herself to millions of viewers , and to more people who will inevitably see the news in the mainstream media ?
about as surprised as we 'll be if the sun rises in the east tomorrow morning . ''
we ca n't argue with them on that one .

documents.title: derbyshire back on screen
text: it 's good to see bbc two and bbc news channel presenter victoria derbyshire back on screen this morning , two weeks after she revealed she had been diagnosed with breast cancer .

she told viewers : `` i just wanted to say thank you to all of you who sent very kind and sensible and inspiring messages after the diagnosis for breast cancer , which i received a couple of weeks ago .

documents.title: grylls takes obama into the wild
text: president obama is to be given `` a crash course in survival techniques '' by bear grylls on the adventurer 's tv programme , us network nbc has announced .
the us president will film a special episode of grylls ' tv show running wild in alaska .
nbc said the pair would `` observe the effects of climate change on the area '' .
but white house press secretary josh earnest admitted the secret service had blocked some ideas from grylls and his producers to ensure the president comes through the experience unscathed .
he said : `` i will not deny your sus that there may have been some suggestions put forward by the bear grylls team that were not approved by the secret service . ''
however he added that they `` have been able to work with the secret service to find a couple of interesting things '' for the president to do .
